overview: Amy’s hot, fiery passion not only makes her lovers explode, but glasses shatter with her every orgasmic scream. Unfortunately. Amy can’t seem to find a man to satisfy her burning sexual appetite. But in matters of sex, Amy won’t give up. She discovers, as will you, a horny super stud who can fulfill her frenzied desires and together, they shatter all sexual boundaries with consuming screams of lust!"
tagline: A Sexplosion That Shattered The Sound Barrier
title: The Screamer
